name: AUTUMN DRIVER
description:
AUTUMN DRIVER is a open world adventure game where you drive a car down the back roads of a remote country side. Sight see and visit the areas on the map to complete the game. There are 5 cars to find and each will bring you a step closer to your goal. Have fun, enjoy the music, and relax.

CONTROLS: 

W/S - Forward and Back.

A/D - Turn

SPACEBAR - Brakes

Right Shift - Respawn

Unity Assets used : 

 https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/44390 - JustCreate

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/35697 - Chromisu

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/54287 - Pelmeshka
